home.subtitle: Your mystical activity guide
home.description: Let the wisdom of the owl reveal your perfect adventure through magical questions
home.privacyNote: Personalized recommendations based on your context and preferences

q0.title: Already have an idea?
q0.hintPlaceholder: E.g. something fun, a nice restaurant...

resolution.label: Location mode
resolution.description: Mogogo searches for real places around you
resolution.upsellMessage: Go Premium so Mogogo can check opening hours, reviews and find the exact address for you!
resolution.quotaExhaustedMessage: You've used all {{limit}} localized searches this month.

context.gpsErrorMessage: Location mode requires your GPS position. Please check that location services are enabled in your phone settings, then try again.

funnel.chooseCategory: Pick the category you prefer, or neither if nothing appeals to you!
funnel.lastCategory: This is the last category! Shall we give it a try?
funnel.loadingStep4: Mogogo is searching through ancient spellbooks...
funnel.poolExhausted: I have nothing left to suggest in "{{category}}". Let's go back one step!
funnel.poolExhaustedRoot: I have nothing left to suggest in "{{category}}". Let's try another theme!
funnel.themesExhaustedMessage: I've gone through all my themes! Tell me what you'd like to do, I'll handle it.
funnel.themesExhaustedPlaceholder: E.g. cook a nice meal, watch an action movie...
funnel.rerollExhausted: I have nothing else to suggest, sorry!
funnel.rerollMaxReached: I've explored all my leads! Accept my last find or start a new adventure!
funnel.placesShortage: Hmm, I only found {{count}} activities around you...
funnel.outdoorResult: Here's what Mogogo found for you!
funnel.adModalMessage: Watch a short video to discover your result!
funnel.adModalWatch: Watch a video to see my result
funnel.adModalWatchStart: Watch a video to start the adventure
funnel.adModalNotWatched: Oops! The magic needs you to watch the whole video to work.
funnel.finalPaid1: A feather takes flight, the magic ignites! Consulting the Grimoire of Destinies...
funnel.finalPaid2: Your feather swirls through the air... Summoning the forces of nature!
funnel.finalPaid3: One feather for one destiny! Hmm... I see the perfect activity appearing!
funnel.finalFree1: My wand is still brimming with magic! Back to the Grimoire...
funnel.finalFree2: This one's on me! Diving back into my enchanted scrolls...
funnel.finalFree3: The session is open, no feather needed! Searching for something even better...
funnel.quotaExhausted: You've reached your localized search limit this month. Come back next month!
funnel.classifyHintFailed: Hmm, I can't figure out what you're looking for... Can you rephrase?
funnel.classifyHintNsfw: I can't help you with that, but I have plenty of other magical ideas! ‚ú®
funnel.classifyHintTooShort: Tell me a bit more so I can help!

plumes.modalMessage: Magic feathers help Mogogo fly towards your next activities! Watch a video to earn some.
plumes.gateMessage: Mogogo needs 10 feathers to keep the magic going. Watch a short video to earn 30!
plumes.startGateMessage: Mogogo needs 10 feathers to start the magic. Watch a short video to earn 30!
plumes.loadingAfterAd: Magic in progress... Mogogo thanks you for your support!
plumes.rewardMessageAd: Mogogo thanks you! Your feathers are ready for new adventures!
plumes.rewardMessagePurchase: Your grimoire overflows with magic! Ready for adventure!

result.noRecommendation: Hmm, I couldn't find a recommendation...
result.rerollResult: Here's an alternative activity for you!

grimoire.title: My Grimoire
grimoire.subtitle: Your interests guide Mogogo
grimoire.mogogoWelcome: Welcome to your Grimoire! Pick the themes you like, I'll remember them!
grimoire.mogogoBoost: Great choice! I'm noting it in my grimoire for next time!

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteConfirmMessage: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted.
settings.promoSuccess: Congratulations! +{{count}} feathers added to your grimoire!
settings.promoAlreadyUsed: This code has already been used on this device.
settings.promoNoDevice: Magic codes are not available on the web.
settings.promoTooManyAttempts: Too many attempts, Mogogo needs a break. Try again in a few minutes.
settings.promoError: Oops, something went wrong. Try again later.
settings.promoPremiumGranted: Welcome to the Premium club! You have unlimited access.

history.title: History
history.mogogoWelcome: Find here all the activities you've enjoyed in the past!
history.emptyState: No activities saved yet. Start a session to begin!
history.deleteConfirmMessage: This session will be permanently deleted.

permissions.locationModalMessage: To find activities near you, I need your location.
permissions.screenSubtitle: Grant permissions to unlock personalized recommendations based on your location and preferences
permissions.locationDescription: Find nearby places, restaurants, and activities tailored to your current location
permissions.notificationsDescription: Get notified about saved recommendations and discover new activities
permissions.analyticsDescription: Help improve Mogogo by sharing anonymous usage data and preferences
permissions.privacyFooter: Your privacy matters. You can change these permissions anytime in Settings.

training.title: Training
training.vibeSubtitle: Choose what you love and what you'd rather skip. This helps me suggest perfect activities for you.
training.onboardingMessage: Before diving into the adventure, tell me what you like! It'll help me guide you.
training.onboardingSubtitle: Pick your favorite themes so Mogogo gets to know you better.
training.settingsHint: You can always adjust this in Settings.
training.servicesSubtitle: Tell me what you use so Mogogo can suggest direct links to your platforms.

feedback.modalTitle: A brilliant idea or a small issue? Whisper it to us, magic works better when we listen üëÇ
feedback.placeholder: Describe your idea, report a bug, or leave a message...
feedback.successMessage: Thank you! Mogogo received your message and will read it carefully!
feedback.errorMessage: Oops, the message could not be sent. Try again later.
feedback.emptyMessage: The scroll is empty! Write something before sending.
